alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CALLAHAN COUNTY THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1055 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rowden, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. Heavy rainfall of 1 inch in 30 minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baird, Putnam, Rowden, and Admiral. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 303 and 322. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
